item.title: Jordan Saadeh Sports Blog
item.description: Welcome to my first blog post, I hope youâ€™re as excited as I am as I document my thoughts, questions, and answers to those questions. I will as well be giving updates on my project that I will be working on, whether that is of I think found some fascinating that I never knew and want to share or anything else in that matter. The first question I look forward to answering in my first project is: Why the New England Patriots need Tom Brady at quarterback to win a Super Bowl.
